action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a collection of colored blocks arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and orange. There is no text or recognizable shapes that can be discerned from this description.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a collection of colorful, pixelated shapes. There are two red rectangles, one on the top left and one on the bottom left. In the top right corner, there is a purple rectangle. Below the purple rectangle, there is a yellow rectangle with a cross shape inside it. To the right of the yellow rectangle, there is a purple rectangle with a cross shape inside it. The image has a retro, pixel art style.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a collection of colored blocks arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The blocks are in shades of green, purple, and orange. There is no text or recognizable shapes that can be discerned from this description.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any red or yellow blocks in your image?

To the right of the yellow rectangle, there is a purple rectangle with a cross shape inside it. The image has a retro, pixel art style.
QUESTION: Are there any red or yellow blocks in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any shapes or patterns that resemble a cross in your image?

ANSWER: Yes
QUESTION: Are there any shapes or patterns that resemble a cross in your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
